metadata.Title: CVE-2014-4047 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Asterisk Open Source 1.8.x before 1.8.28.1, 11.x before 11.10.1, and 12.x before 12.3.1 and Certified Asterisk 1.8.15 before 1.8.15-cert6 and 11.6 before 11.6-cert3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (connection consumption) via a large number of (1) inactive or (2) incomplete HTTP connections.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
